name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Electrical Engineer, I bring exceptional problem-solving abilities and analytical skills honed over 8 years in the field. My expertise lies in **Electrical System Design**, **Power Distribution**, and ensuring compliance with **NEC codes** and **IEC codes**. I have successfully contributed to projects involving **Direct Liquid Cooling** systems and gained experience in achieving **Tier certification** across various deployments.
In previous roles, I've demonstrated strong troubleshooting capabilities and a commitment to collaboration with cross-functional teams. My effective communication skills have enabled me to present complex technical ideas clearly and work closely with stakeholders to achieve project goals.

experience.responsibilities:
Led the design and implementation of **Electrical System Design** for healthcare and financial platforms ensuring compliance with **NEC codes** and **IEC codes**.
Developed efficient **Power Distribution** systems that support scalable and fault-tolerant architectures, enhancing operational reliability and performance ratings by **30%**.
Utilized effective **Direct Liquid Cooling** strategies to maintain optimal operational temperatures in high-performance data centers, significantly reducing cooling costs by **20%**.
Achieved **Tier certification** in compliance with industry standards by applying robust engineering principles and meticulous documentation.
Facilitated troubleshooting sessions, utilizing strong **analytical skills** to diagnose and resolve system issues, leading to a **40%** reduction in downtime.
Fostered collaboration across multidisciplinary teams to enhance project outcomes, utilizing advanced **communication skills** to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Exhibited exceptional problem-solving capabilities by developing innovative solutions for electrical load balancing and redundancy.
Conducted thorough reviews of electrical systems to identify areas for improvement and implemented corrective actions, resulting in a **25%** increase in operational efficiency.
Established best practices for the integration of renewable energy sources, optimizing energy usage and promoting sustainability initiatives within the organization.
Mentored junior engineers, enhancing team capabilities and ensuring the adherence to safety standards and regulations.

Designed and developed electrical systems with a focus on electrical system design to ensure optimal power distribution and efficiency in high-performance environments.
Performed rigorous compliance checks with **NEC codes** and **IEC codes**, ensuring all electrical designs meet industry standards and safety regulations.
Utilized problem-solving and analytical skills to troubleshoot complex electrical issues in power distribution systems, achieving a **30%** reduction in downtime.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to implement direct liquid cooling systems, enhancing system reliability and performance in mission-critical applications.
Conducted assessments for tier certification of electrical systems, ensuring they meet the required standards for operational readiness.
Communicated technical concepts clearly to stakeholders, enhancing collaboration with engineering and operations teams for superior project outcomes.
Leveraged expertise in electrical system design to contribute to innovative solutions, incorporating advanced technologies that are cost-effective and sustainable.

Designed and optimized **electrical system designs** for efficient **power distribution** with a focus on **Tier certification** compliance and assessment of **NEC** and **IEC codes**.
Validated the implementation of **direct liquid cooling** solutions in **9** major projects, enhancing thermal management efficiency by **30%**.
Conducted rigorous **problem-solving** initiatives related to system failures which reduced downtime by **25%**, demonstrating strong **analytical skills** and **troubleshooting** capabilities.
Facilitated cross-functional **collaboration** with project teams to streamline the integration of electrical systems, ensuring adherence to industry standards and improving project delivery timelines by **15%**.
Developed comprehensive documentation and presented technical insights to stakeholders, showcasing excellent **communication skills** and simplifying complex concepts for varied audiences.
Participated in review meetings, actively contributing to project strategies and solutions, demonstrating a commitment to continuous improvement and innovation in electrical engineering practices.

skills:
